entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers or drizzle. Low zero except minus 3 inland.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low zero except minus 3 inland. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023
